Name: Dark Forest
About the game: Inspired by Voxel and FPS games, Dark Forest is a fast-paced shooter that places you in a forest arena to survive endless waves of monsters. Presuming that you liked our game and contemplating of buying Dark Forest please keep in mind that we are a very passionate but small team of three. This is not a big company experience with hours and hours of content. What weâ€™d like to offer you is a simple game that challenges you to survive and compete with people all around the world for the highest score or merely to unwind and unstress killing monsters using magic. Game Features: Face 12 Different Monsters. 3 different skills to use as you wish. Collect mana to allow you to use the skills. Sprint bar that allows you to run faster. Submit score to compete on global leaderboard. View the score of your friends and other people on leaderboard menu. Recent Updates: Added a new monster: Watcher of the Abyss. Added a texture of grass to the ground. FPS optimization and performance. Changed mechanics in the use of skills.
